Logging¶

SALTS has a built-in logger object. To use it, run from src.logger import log at the start of a module and then call the log.log() method as needed.

class src.logger.logger_api._Logger¶

The class that handles logging.

log(level: Level, msg: str) → None¶

Method for writing to logs.

Log levels are (in order of increasing severity):

DEBUG

INFO

WARNING

ERROR

CRITICAL

Levels stored in Level enum. Default level is INFO.

Parameters:

  • level – Level of the input log

  • msg (str) – The message to display in the log.

Returns:

None
